r.d: Easy, secure password management for PHP
r.n: - Added functionality for calculating password strength scores based on various algorithms. - Removed \Phpass base class. - Added \Phpass\Hash and \Phpass\Strength classes. - Moved hash adapter classes into \Phpass\Hash\Adapter namespace. - Created \Phpass\Strength\Adapter namespace for strength calculator adapters. - First pass at making the library PSR-0 compliant. - Addition of library autoloader functionality.
